scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path ./src --include-path ./node_modules src/containers/styles -o src/containers/styles --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass --include-path ./src --include-path ./node_modules src/containers/styles -o src/containers/styles --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true --watch --recursive
